body:
I'm trying to install Fenics with the latest version of Spack (straight git clone) on Fedora 25. Everything builds except Fenics itself:
```
==> Building fenics [Package]
==> Executing phase : 'install'
==> Error: ProcessError: Command exited with status 2:
    'make' '-j8'
/home/jay/programs/spack-20170228/var/spack/repos/builtin/packages/fenics/package.py:198, in install:
     143      def install(self, spec, prefix):
     144          for package in ['ufl', 'ffc', 'fiat', 'instant']:
     145              with working_dir(join_path('depends', package)):
     146                  setup_py('install', '--prefix=%s' % prefix)
     147  
     148          cmake_args = [
     149              '-DCMAKE_BUILD_TYPE:STRING={0}'.format(
     150                  'Debug' if '+debug' in spec else 'RelWithDebInfo'),
     151              '-DBUILD_SHARED_LIBS:BOOL={0}'.format(
     152                  self.cmake_is_on('+shared')),
     153              '-DDOLFIN_SKIP_BUILD_TESTS:BOOL=ON',
     154              '-DDOLFIN_ENABLE_OPENMP:BOOL={0}'.format(
     155                  self.cmake_is_on('+openmp')),
     156              '-DDOLFIN_ENABLE_CHOLMOD:BOOL={0}'.format(
     157                  self.cmake_is_on('suite-sparse')),
     158              '-DDOLFIN_ENABLE_HDF5:BOOL={0}'.format(
     159                  self.cmake_is_on('hdf5')),
     160              '-DDOLFIN_ENABLE_MPI:BOOL={0}'.format(
     161                  self.cmake_is_on('mpi')),
     162              '-DDOLFIN_ENABLE_PARMETIS:BOOL={0}'.format(
     163                  self.cmake_is_on('parmetis')),
     164              '-DDOLFIN_ENABLE_PASTIX:BOOL={0}'.format(
     165                  self.cmake_is_on('pastix')),
     166              '-DDOLFIN_ENABLE_PETSC:BOOL={0}'.format(
     167                  self.cmake_is_on('petsc')),
     168              '-DDOLFIN_ENABLE_PETSC4PY:BOOL={0}'.format(
     169                  self.cmake_is_on('py-petsc4py')),
     170              '-DDOLFIN_ENABLE_PYTHON:BOOL={0}'.format(
     171                  self.cmake_is_on('python')),
     172              '-DDOLFIN_ENABLE_QT:BOOL={0}'.format(
     173                  self.cmake_is_on('qt')),
     174              '-DDOLFIN_ENABLE_SCOTCH:BOOL={0}'.format(
     175                  self.cmake_is_on('scotch')),
     176              '-DDOLFIN_ENABLE_SLEPC:BOOL={0}'.format(
     177                  self.cmake_is_on('slepc')),
     178              '-DDOLFIN_ENABLE_SLEPC4PY:BOOL={0}'.format(
     179                  self.cmake_is_on('py-slepc4py')),
     180              '-DDOLFIN_ENABLE_SPHINX:BOOL={0}'.format(
     181                  self.cmake_is_on('py-sphinx')),
     182              '-DDOLFIN_ENABLE_TRILINOS:BOOL={0}'.format(
     183                  self.cmake_is_on('trilinos')),
     184              '-DDOLFIN_ENABLE_UMFPACK:BOOL={0}'.format(
     185                  self.cmake_is_on('suite-sparse')),
     186              '-DDOLFIN_ENABLE_VTK:BOOL={0}'.format(
     187                  self.cmake_is_on('vtk')),
     188              '-DDOLFIN_ENABLE_ZLIB:BOOL={0}'.format(
     189                  self.cmake_is_on('zlib')),
     190          ]
     191  
     192          cmake_args.extend(std_cmake_args)
     193  
     194          with working_dir('build', create=True):
     195              cmake('..', *cmake_args)
     196  
     197              make()
  >> 198              make('install')

See build log for details:
  /tmp/jay/spack-stage/spack-stage-3GC0cy/dolfin-2016.1.0/spack-build.out
```
I'll submit the log file if you want.
title: Fenics doesn't install on Fedora 25
